name: Christmas Spirits
description:
Hello everybody! It's Christmas Eve, and to celebrate this date, here's a short and simple story, but with a lot of affection. The idea for this project came quickly and spontaneously, and it would be a waste not to share it. Because it was so quick, there is still a lot of placeholder material that must be changed if, and when, a final version comes out!

Genres: Visual Novel.

Languages: English and Portuguese. 

Esther and Ellie are twin sisters who used to get along great when they were younger. However, in the present, certain unfortunate incidents have driven a wedge between the two. As their emotions bubble to the point of bursting on Christmas Eve, Ellie is visited by three ghosts who offer mysterious gifts and visions of what was and what could be...

Others: 

Twins' Mother;

Twins' Father;

Spirits of the Past, Present and Future;

Derek, twins' older Brother;


- Short tale of about 15k words;

- A hertwarming and fun christmas story;

- Choices that allow developing the state of reconciliation of the sisters;

- Dramatic and tense moments;

Screenplay, artwork and development: B.G.Riccetto and M.Graymoon

General  support: M.Graymoon

Backgrounds: Original VN Maker and DLCs

Sounds and Musics: Original VN Maker, Cynicmusic, Rony D.Kid and OwlishMedia.

Special thanks to M.Graymoon. That keeps stopping me from giving up and pretending to be a vegetable <3
